DataElement.preferredName: Systemic Therapy And/Or Chemotherapy Regimen Therapeutic Procedure Administered Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The free-text field to describe the systemic therapy and or chemotherapy regimen that was administered.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Systemic Therapy And/Or Chemotherapy Regimen Therapeutic Procedure Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Treatment using substances that travel through the bloodstream, reaching and affecting cells all over the body._Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid._Any regimen that can be used for the treatment of cancer._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Concepts.definition: Treatment using substances that travel through the bloodstream, reaching and affecting cells all over the body.
Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid.
Any regimen that can be used for the treatment of cancer and non-neoplastic disease.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).
